entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet/runtime and dotnet/emsdk fail to build stable for .NET 6 #57982
    packaging, area-Build-mono, 6.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Generic Text API's #57980
    api-suggestion, untriaged
  • SocketsHttpHandler allocating more per HTTP/1.1 request due to additional async state machines #57977
    area-System.Net.Http, tenet-performance, untriaged, regression-from-last-release, 6.0.0
  • Assertion at /__w/1/s/src/mono/mono/sgen/sgen-alloc.c:409, condition `<disabled>' not met #57976
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono, needs author feedback, Future
  • [ Hot Reload / EnC ] A newly added Type will not be returned from Type.GetType or Assembly.GetType (they return null) #57972
    area-System.Reflection, untriaged
  • RuntimeIdentifiers stack trace issue #57962
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, untriaged
  • Analyzer proposal: Discourage `== null` and `!= null` syntax #57961
    area-Meta, untriaged, code-analyzer
  • Dump generation for the server GC apps failure #57960
    area-System.Diagnostics, in pr, 6.0.0
  • Generating CORE_ROOT fails on linux-musl-arm and linux-musl-arm64 #57958
    arch-arm32, arch-arm64, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, untriaged, blocking-outerloop, os-linux-musl
  • Assert failure: (ptrdiff_t)generation_free_list_space (gen) >= 0 #57956
    arch-arm64, os-windows, area-GC-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • hostfxr.dll loading failing on Windows 11 Arm64 with .NET 6 RC2 #57953
    area-Host, untriaged
  • Regex SourceGenerator Feature Request: Named Capture Variables #57952
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, untriaged
  • Debugger incorrectly resolves argument in MethodImplOptions.NoOptimization frame in Windows x86 #57951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Update unsupported distros in helix queues to latest and add missing ones #57947
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • 'dotnet build' or 'dotnet restore' failed with exit code null #57944
    area-System.Security, untriaged
  • dotnet test fails with error "Cannot get symbol ubrk_close_68 from libicui18n" with AppLocalIcu #57942
    area-System.Globalization, 6.0.0
  • Long running test: ManyProducerConsumer_ConcurrentReadWrite_WithBufferedCapacity_Success #57941
    area-System.Threading.Channels, untriaged
  • MonoTests.System.Runtime.Caching.MemoryCacheTestExpires4.TestCacheShrink test failure #57938
    area-System.Runtime.Caching, untriaged
  • Test timeout: ReceiveMessageFromAsyncV4BoundToSpecificV4_Success #57937
    area-System.Net.Sockets, Future
  • MonoTests.System.Runtime.Caching.MemoryCacheTestExpires5.TestCacheExpiryOrdering test failure #57936
    area-System.Runtime.Caching, untriaged
  • SetOut.SetOutReadToEnd (System.Console.Tests) failing #57935
    area-System.Console, untriaged
  • dotnet crashes in illink-sharedframework.targets step on OSX arm64 #57934
    bug, untriaged
  • MAUI iOS App Store rejection: App references non-public symbols _FSEventStreamCreate #57931
    untriaged, os-ios
  • Tests time out: System.Net.Sockets.Tests.DnsEndPointTest - mostly on SLES.15 in release/6.0 branches #57929
    area-System.Net.Sockets, test bug, 6.0.0
  • Unnecessary repository tasks are building up-front #57923
    untriaged, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Error using System.Drawing.Common with FSI #57922
    area-System.Drawing, 5.0.x
  • Example usage of NullabilityInfoContext fails on preview.7 #57920
    bug, area-System.Reflection, 6.0.0
  • Assertion failed '!nodeInfo.IsLclVarWrite() || !unusedLclVarReads.Contains(nodeInfo.LclNum())' #57919
    arch-x86, os-windows, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [JitStressWithRandomNumbers] Assertion failed '!"Bad type in gtNewZeroConNode" Morph - Global' #57918
    JitStress, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [JitStressWithRandomNumbers] Assertion failed 'varDsc->TypeGet() != TYP_STRUCT Generate code' #57917
    JitStress, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0

    JitStress, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [JitStressWithRandomNumbers] inliningVars.cmd fails #57914
    JitStress, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [JitStressWithRandomNumbers] Assertion failed 'emitTypeSizes[TypeGet(type)] > 0 Generate code' #57913

    JitStress, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0

    arch-x86, os-windows, untriaged, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Test failure System.Net.Sockets.Tests.SendFile_CancellableTask.GreaterThan2GBFile_SendsAllBytes #57907

Closed

  • Enhance lifetime monitoring in EventListener #45247

    bug, area-System.Net.Http, blocking-release, tenet-compatibility, 6.0.0

    area-Single-File, blocking-clean-ci, 6.0.0
  • Consider shipping OSX Universal binaries #41127
    Design Discussion, arch-arm64, area-Host, os-mac-os-x-big-sur, 6.0.0
  • [Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection] After configuring a type using Configure<T> when properties inside it defines a property with ``{ get; set; } = some default value;`` results in the value set in Configure<T> to be overwritten. #57950
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, needs further triage, Future
  • Assertion failed 'ssaNum != SsaConfig::RESERVED_SSA_NUM #57916
    arch-x86, os-windows, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0

    bug, tenet-reliability, area-System.Net.Quic, 6.0.0
  • Remove debian 9 and add debian 11 to helix queues #57837
    area-Infrastructure, 6.0.0
  • Consider supporting linker scripts on Linux #57904
    area-Interop-coreclr, untriaged

Updated

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove IsCompilationProcess and NingenEnabled (always false) #57986
    area-Interop-coreclr

    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0

    area-System.Diagnostics
  • [release/6.0] Fix nullable annotations for AssociatedMetadataTypeTypeDescriptionProvider #57979

    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices

    area-Debugger-mono

    area-System.Globalization, 6.0.0

    area-System.IO.Pipelines

    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono, wasm-aot-test
